sentences.en: "Getting fit" became synonymous not just with healthier living, but with a leaner, meaner body, and the ground was laid for a burgeoning gym industry.
sentences.cn: “获得适合”成为同义词的不只是健康的生活，但一个更精简，寡情的身体，与地面是一个新兴的体育产业奠定。

sentences.en: ADOLESCENCE is practically synonymous in our culture with risk taking, emotional drama and all forms of outlandish behavior.
sentences.cn: 在我们的文化里，青春期几乎是冒险、情感闹剧和各种出格举动的同义词。

sentences.en: As a consultant the word client is synonymous with the word customer.
sentences.cn: 在“顾问”这个方面,client和customer(顾客)是同义词.

sentences.en: Going grey is not necessarily synonymous with growing old.
sentences.cn: 头发变白并不一定等于变老了。

sentences.en: His deeds had made his name synonymous with victory.
sentences.cn: 他的英勇事迹使他的名字成了胜利的代名词.

sentences.en: HIS name is synonymous with Mandopop in the 21 st century.
sentences.cn: 他的名字在21世纪和华语流行音乐是同义词。 。

sentences.en: In politics, power and popularity are not synonymous.
sentences.cn: 在政治上，权力和声望并非相依而存。

sentences.en: In their minds, effort is synonymous with discomfort.
sentences.cn: 在他们心目中，努力是不适的同义词。

sentences.en: In those days botany was virtually synonymous with herbalism.
sentences.cn: 那时候植物学和本草学实际上是同义的.

sentences.en: Indeed, in may regions " forestry " is synonymous with " plantation culture ".
sentences.cn: 事实上, 在许多地区 “ 林业 ” 就是 “ 森林栽培 ” 的同义语.

sentences.en: Many individuals consider career counseling to be synonymous with assessments.
sentences.cn: 许多个人考虑生涯辅导,以等同评估.

sentences.en: Paris has always been synonymous with elegance, luxury and style.
sentences.cn: 巴黎一直是优雅、奢华和时尚的代名词。

sentences.en: Synonymous with illegal: used with instruction code, character, etc.
sentences.cn: 与“非法”同义,主要用在: 置于指令码 、 字符等前面,构成禁用指令码 、 禁用字符等.

sentences.en: The impression has been that Umno is synonymous with Malays.
sentences.cn: 长期以来,人们即有一种印象,巫统就是马来人,马来人就是巫统.

sentences.en: The reaction is catalysed by a transaminase or an amino transferase ( the terms are synonymous ).
sentences.cn: 反应是由转氨酶或氨基转移酶? ( 同义名词 ) 催化的.

sentences.en: Thus both photography and fashion are synonymous with artificiality and pure superficiality.
sentences.cn: 所以摄影和时尚不管是人为理解还是表面来说都是同义的.

sentences.en: Wealth and money in short , are, in common language , considered as in every respect synonymous.
sentences.cn: 按着通俗的说法,财富与货币,无论从哪一点看来, 都是同义语.

sentences.en: Wealth is not necessarily synonymous with happiness.
Working solo does not have to be synonymous with stress.
sentences.cn: 工作单骑不是必须强调同义词.

trans.tran_cn: 同义的，类义的，同义词的
trans.tran_en: something that is synonymous with something else is considered to be very closely connected with it
